code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{styled}from"@mui/system";import ResizeRoomButton from"./ResizeRoomButton";import VideosContainer from"./VideosContainer";import RoomButtons from"./RoomButtons/RoomButtons";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainContainer=styled("div")({position:"absolute",borderRadius:"8px",display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"center",backgroundColor:"#202225"});const fullScreenRoomStyle={width:"100%",height:"100vh"};const minimizedRoomStyle={bottom:"0px",right:"0px",width:"30%",height:"40vh"};const Room=()=>{const[isRoomMinimized,setIsRoomMinimized]=useState(true);const roomResizeHandler=()=>{setIsRoomMinimized(!isRoomMinimized);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MainContainer,{style:isRoomMinimized?minimizedRoomStyle:fullScreenRoomStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VideosContainer,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RoomButtons,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResizeRoomButton,{isRoomMinimized:isRoomMinimized,handleRoomResize:roomResizeHandler})]});};export default Room;
